add_by_ip.title: Manually add
add_by_ip.no_new_devices_hint: All found TVs are already added. Try to add your TV manually.
add_by_ip.click_here_documentation: Click here to view the documentation.

authenticate.intro: Enter the code displayed on the TV

verify.verified: Wake-on-LAN is enabled and working correctly!
verify.errorDescription:
The on/off behavior of the TV may not work as expected if Wake-on-LAN is not enabled.
When your TV is put in standby mode, you can control it for about 10 minutes before it is fully turned off. Without Wake-on-LAN, there is no way to turn your TV back on after this.

error.unpaired: The device was un-paired and needs to be re-paired
